metadata.title: CVE-2018-25107 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Crypt::Random::Source package before 0.13 for Perl has a fallback tothe built-in rand() function, which is not a secure source of random bits.

criterions.comment: libcrypt-random-source-perl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
